title: Balalaika
creator_credit: Reinhold Schunzel, Lawrence Weingarten and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: An elicit relationship evolves between a Russian prince and a lovely cafe singer, a relationship that is seemingly doomed for these star-crossed lovers at a time when Russia is facing political upheaval. A romantic musical drama featuring Nelson Eddy, Ilona Massey, Charlie Ruggles, Frank Morgan, Lionel Atwill, C. Aubrey Smith.
